It was in 2019 that he had left his boyhood club in order to join the Premier League giants in a Scottish record £25 million move. A lot has happened since […] Celtic offered superb Kieran Tierney transfer boost - The Celtic Bhoys - The Celtic Bhoys - Celtic FC News, Transfer Rumours and Fan Community

entry.title: Upcoming coverage after a strange start; the Celtic TV situation for the rest of pre-season
entry.summary: Celtic supporters should be able to see more of the team in action later this pre-season. The Hoops played their first organised match on Wednesday evening as things got off to a strange start. There was no video, audio or text coverage of the clash against Portimonense. Numerous score applications have the result down as ... The post Upcoming coverage after a strange start; the Celtic TV situation for the rest of pre-season appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

entry.title: Steven Gerrard wants ex-Celtic star who terrorised Rangers; Fabrizio Romano update
entry.summary: Former Celtic striker, Moussa Dembele has been approached by Saudi Arabain club, Al Ettifaq according to Italian transfer specialist, Fabrizio Romano. The Saudi club have recently hired former Rangers manager, Steven Gerrard as their manager. The Frenchman is still a free agent after leaving Lyon when his contract expired at the end of the season. ... The post Steven Gerrard wants ex-Celtic star who terrorised Rangers; Fabrizio Romano update appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

entry.title: Looking forward to getting back to see Celtic
entry.summary: It’s nice to be back writing about Celtic after the summer break. We look forward to another season following Celtic home and away. Thanks to everyone who bought the latest More than 90 Minutes. The print edition is heading for another sell out with less than 5 copies left as I write. Work will begin […] The post Looking forward to getting back to see Celtic appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.

entry.title: Brendan Rodgers states the achievable UEFA Champions League goal for Celtic this season
entry.summary: In the hype around Brendan Rodgers’ return to Celtic last month, there were some pretty big claims and ambitions being reported by journalists around Scotland about the manager’s expectations of the future. One columnist suggested that Rodgers’ private aim was to bring the Bhoys to a European final. Publicly, the Celtic boss is never going ... The post Brendan Rodgers states the achievable UEFA Champions League goal for Celtic this season appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

entry.title: Celtic starter undergoes surgery and out for 6-8 weeks
entry.summary: We are just days into pre-season training and there is already worrying injury news for Celtic. But the club have faced fitness issues for some time now and that has not stopped them from being successful on the pitch. They are coming off of a treble-winning campaign after all. This is not the start that […] Celtic starter undergoes surgery and out for 6-8 weeks - The Celtic Bhoys - The Celtic Bhoys - Celtic FC News, Transfer Rumours and Fan Community

entry.title: "Got to give respect to Ronny" - Rodgers brings up Deila in Celtic media response
entry.summary: Ronny Deila got a mention from Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers at Thursday’s press conference. The current Hoops boss was speaking to the media from Portugal where his first-team stars are being put through their paces. Rodgers returned to Celtic almost a month ago, over four years on from his first spell at the club. At ... The post "Got to give respect to Ronny" - Rodgers brings up Deila in Celtic media response appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

entry.title: Tomoki Iwata's encouraging, self-critical Celtic appraisal
entry.summary: Tomoki Iwata is the latest Celtic player to speak to club media in Portugal. As we’ve been covering over the past few days, a number of the first-team squad have been put in front of the Celtic TV cameras for a chat.
